dataList.name: The Thumb's Officer, Capo IIII
dataList.desc:
Take -30% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking]

When flipping a Coin that consumes [BulletPropellant]: while not having [BulletPropellant] does not cancel this unit's attacks, the Coin's "inflict [Combustion]" and "inflict [Combustion] Count" effects do not activate

In a Clash, inflict +(1 + (# of Clashes / 3)) [Vibration] Count
(max 3; 3 times per turn against the same target)

dataList.name: Ten Blades of the East
dataList.desc:
At Encounter Start, and at the Turn Start of gaining a new pattern:
- Gain 1 [Bothersome]
- Heal 5 SP for every 10% missing HP on self (max 40)

dataList.name: Chosen Prey
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict 1 [Prey] against the target that dealt the most damage to this unit last turn

After Lei Heng attacks the target with [Prey], if the target is:
- Staggered, all enemies lose 10 SP and gain 1 [ParryingResultDown] for this turn and next turn (once per turn)
- Defeated, activate the above effect once more

dataList.name: Tiantui Star's Blade [天退星刀]
dataList.desc:
Unopposed Attacks deal +30% damage On Hit and inflict 1 [Vulnerable] next turn

Skill Coins that spent [BulletPropellant] deal +20% damage On Hit and inflict 2 [DefenseDown] next turn

The above effects do not activate if the target equipped a Defense Skill

dataList.name: Tigermark Round Reload
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at 90% or less HP, or at the end of the 2nd turn, reload [BulletPropellant] and gain a new pattern next turn
- If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Lei Heng [雷橫]
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at 80% or less HP, or at the end of the 4th turn, gain a new pattern next turn
- Use a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver'), repeat every 3rd turn. +10 to Min & Max Speed for turns in which this unit uses this Skill
- At the start of that turn, gain 25 [BattleSense]
- If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Tiantui Star [天退星]
dataList.desc:
If this unit's HP dropped to 60% or below at Turn End, or if this unit is set to use a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver') next turn for the second time this Encounter, gain a new pattern next turn
- When that turn starts, gain 1 [Irritation]
- When that turn starts, gain 18 [BulletPropellantSpecial] and reload immediately
· If this unit spends all [BulletPropellantSpecial], convert the effect to [BulletPropellant] and summon 2 of "Rigid Soldato of the Thumb" units next turn and have them supply this unit with [BulletPropellantSpecial]
- When Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Lei Heng, The Pinky's Tiantui Star
dataList.desc:
Turn End: at 40% or less HP, or if this unit is set to use a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver') next turn for the third time this Encounter, gain a new pattern next turn
- Replace the powerful attack 'Tanglecleaver' with 'Savage Tigerslayer's Perfected Flurry of Blades'. +15 to Min & Max Speed for turns in which this unit uses this Skill
- Convert [BattleSense] to [RestoredBattleSense]
- Convert [Irritation] to [HugeIrritation]
- If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Chachihu [揷翅虎]
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: based on this unit's Speed value,
- Heal SP equal to Speed value. At less than 0 SP, double the heal amount
- Gain (Speed Value / 3) [SlashDamageUp] (max 5)

Encounter Start: if this unit has 3+ [Binding], the above effect does not activate; gain [DefenseDown] equal to [Binding] on self (max 9)

dataList.name: Tiantui Star's Blade - Overheat
dataList.desc: If this unit used a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver' or 'Savage Tigerslayer's Perfected Flurry of Blades'), gain [Complacency] next turn equal to the number of times those skills were used (max 5)

dataList.name: Savage Tigermark Support
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: gain 5 [Vulnerable]
Turn End: supply [BulletPropellantSpecial] to Lei Heng

If this unit is killed, this unit cannot supply [BulletPropellantSpecial] for Lei Heng; Lei Heng gains 1 [Vulnerable] and 1 [ParryingResultDown] next turn

dataList.name: My Little Brother's Hand I Let Slip
dataList.desc:
On Hit against an enemy, inflict 1 [GazeReplica] (once per Identity per turn)
When attacked by an enemy, inflict 1 [GazeReplica] against the attacker (once per Identity per turn)
Turn Start: if Hong Lu is on the field, inflict 1 [GazeReplica] against Hong Lu

dataList.name: Grasp
dataList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [GraspReplica]
Gains a new pattern when there are targets with [GraspReplica]; +0.1 to all Resistances

dataList.name: E.G.O Corrosion - N Corp.
dataList.desc:
After entering this Encounter, gain 1 [EgoErodeReplica] at every passing Turn End
- Turn End: at less than 50% HP, or at -20 SP or less, gain 1 additional [EgoErodeReplica]

dataList.name: E.G.O Temporary Max Attunement
dataList.desc: If there are 4+ Sinners with 4+ [GazeReplica] Stacks, use the Skill 'Awe[TabExplain], Contempt[TabExplain] 【Unleashed】' Skill

dataList.name: Better avert your gazes
dataList.desc: Where there are other surviving allies, if this unit becomes the main target from 5+ enemies, those enemies lose 10 HP and SP

dataList.name: The Cost of Fell Bullets
dataList.desc: On Hit, heal 5 SP; on Clash Lose, lose 5 SP

dataList.name: Charge Forth
dataList.desc: On enemy Kill, gain +3 [Breath] Count

dataList.name: A new era is upon us, my dear fellow.
dataList.desc: At less than -20 SP, use a special pattern

dataList.name: Please, dedicate yourself for the new ideal.
dataList.desc: If an N Corp. Employee(except Jia Huan)'s HP is less than 50%, use a special pattern
HP does not drop below 50%

dataList.name: Little Baoyu, the lineage of Family Hierarchs cannot end here...
dataList.desc: Loses Encounter when Hong Lu dies. All Skills prioritize Hong Lu

dataList.name: Who shall serve the elders, who shall convey the revered Xianhuang Worm's will to Hongyuan then?!!!
dataList.desc: On Hit after Clash Win against Hong Lu: inflict 1 [PileObedient] (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Golden Bough Assimilation - Malattunement
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: gain [GoldenBoughSync]

dataList.name: Forbidden Pill of Hongyuan - Completed Heixian Bolus [全黑仙丸]
dataList.desc: Gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseDown] every time this unit uses a different type of Skill (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Hongyuan has always been a putty in the hands of the revered Xianren
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if Panicked, recover from Panic at the next Turn Start and reset SP to 0

When recovering from Panic, gain 2 [Enhancement] and 2 [Endurance] next turn; if Hong Lu has [Obedient], heal 15 SP

dataList.name: Watch this little girl...!
dataList.desc: Loses Encounter when Hong Lu dies. If there are this unit's summoned units at Turn Start, heal 10 SP

dataList.name: Golden Bough Assimilation - Distortion
dataList.desc: Start of the 2nd Phase: gain [GoldenBoughSyncDistorted]

dataList.name: Every Family Hierarch has the duty to surrender their bodies to the Xianhuang Worm and his honored will
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if Panicked, recover from Panic at the next Turn Start and reset SP to 0

When recovering from Panic,
- gain 2 [Enhancement], 2 [Endurance], and 1 [Agility] next turn
- If there are units summoned by this unit, heal 15 SP
- If Hong Lu has [Obedient], heal 15 SP
HP does not drop below 85%
HP does not drop below 65%
HP does not drop below 50%

dataList.name: Rot and Decay in the Husk of Gold and Jade [金玉其外 敗絮其中]
dataList.desc:
If this unit has 10+ [Burst], take +10% damage
If this unit has 5+ types of negative effects, take +10% damage

dataList.name: A Family Hierarch without the revered Xianhuang Worm will never serve Hongyuan
dataList.desc:
At 0 HP, the Body Part becomes Staggered next turn
Then, this Part becomes Severed, and the Body Part gains 2 [Vulnerable]
HP does not drop below 20%

dataList.name: Witness Me, O Revered Xianren!
dataList.desc: When this unit is present, Jia Mu gains 200 Shield for her Core and every Part

dataList.name: Duties of the Precious Jade
dataList.desc:
As long as this unit is present, apply the following effects to the caged unit:
- Become 'immobilized'
- This unit's buffs, HP, and SP cannot be changed

dataList.name: Departure
dataList.desc: When this unit is defeated, return the caged character to the battle next turn

dataList.name: Refute the Evil; Restore Justice [破邪顯正]
dataList.desc:
If this unit is defeated by the Sinners, activate the following effects:
- All allies heal 10 SP; all allies gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn
- Inflict 5 [Binding], 3 [AttackDown], and 5 [Vulnerable] against Jia Mu for the next 2 turns
- The unit that was caged in this unit heals up to 45 SP. Gain 2 [Enhancement] upon its return
- Gain 3 E.G.O Resources to all Affinities

dataList.name: O The Supreme Xianren of Immortality
dataList.desc: Has the [SupremeEternalLife] effect

dataList.name: Let us be eternally free from aging and death
dataList.desc:
HP does not drop below 1

At 1 HP, replace [SupremeEternalLife] with [ImperfectEternalLife]

dataList.name: Knowledge of Immortality
dataList.desc: If this unit's HP drops to 1 upon getting hit, heal 10 SP to the Sinner who attacked this unit; then, gain 3 random E.G.O Resources for the least-owned Sin Affinities (activates once for this unit)

dataList.name: Panic Recovery
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if this unit is Panicked, reset SP to 0

When recovering from Panic: at the next Turn Start, heal SP by this unit's missing HP (max 30)
